TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DefaultWorkflowLoaderService extends System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowLoaderService

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Represents the default version of created by the workflow runtime engine if no other workflow loader service is added.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)]
The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> class creates a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowLoaderService> object when the runtime engine is started, if no other workflow loader service derived from <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowLoaderService> has been added as a service.
